function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased medical waste from single-use masks and gloves","category":"Pollution increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased consumption of resources in homes during extended lockdowns, leading to environmental impacts and resource strain.","category":"Energy consumption and sustainability issues","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elevated ozone pollution and changes in nox concentrations in cities, impacting air quality and health.","category":"Air quality and pollution effects","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased energy usage and the need for sustainable energy sources due to global lockdowns.","category":"Energy consumption and sustainability issues","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Better solid-waste management","category":"Wastewater and sanitation risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental impact of disease mitigation measures","category":"Environmental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between zoonotic diseases and climate change & land usage","category":"Climate change effects","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of human, domestic, and wild animal habitats leading to virus mixing and propagation","category":"Urbanization and habitat loss","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high co2 levels","category":"Air quality and pollution effects","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of outdoor environmental conditions","category":"Environmental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring air quality parameters at infrequent intervals","category":"Air quality and pollution effects","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of indoor air pollution monitoring and control","category":"Air quality and pollution effects","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper maintenance of green spaces leading to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Biodiversity and ecological impacts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of control over room
